document.full_text: inventor judah klausner's company has clinched technology license agreements with yahoo, panasonic, avaya inc and qwest communications, ending its legal battles with those companies.
document.title: klausner signs deals with yahoo, panasonic, others
lines_and_colors: inventor judah klausner's company has clinched technology license agreements with yahoo, panasonic, avaya inc and qwest communications, ending its legal battles with those companies.
